resources.string: The rise of technology has amplified digital distractions. We are on a mission to decrease social media overuse. We need solid digital permissions to allow the app to simply nudge you out the deep digital rabbit hole.
Pause content at 1 second giving time to choose if you want to watch or not. It bestows you with the ability to assess the limitless \"entertainment\" available to you.
No content starts auto-playing while watching shorts.
